name: export-to-csv
description: Easily create CSV data from json collection

scripts.build: rm -rf output && bun build index.ts --outdir ./output --minify && tsc
scripts.e2e: rm -rf integration/export-to-csv.js && bun run build && cp output/index.js integration/export-to-csv.js && playwright test
scripts.e2e-ci: rm -rf integration/export-to-csv.js && bun run build && cp output/index.js integration/export-to-csv.js && bunx playwright install --with-deps && playwright test

author: alexcaza
